title: How to Make a Fried Bologna Sandwich

steps.headline: First heat a frying pan to medium-high heat.
Then lay the bologna slice in the pan and cut a slit from the edge to the middle of the slice.
While the bologna slice browns on one side prepare the bread by spreading mayonnaise on one or both slices of the bread.
After the bologna is browned on the first side flip it over with a fork or spatula and let the other side brown.
steps.description: Remember this side will cook faster.

steps.headline: When it is finished pick it up with the fork or spatula and lay it on one side of the bread.
Lay the other side on top of the bologna and enjoy.

text: First heat a frying pan to medium-high heat.  Then lay the bologna slice in the pan and cut a slit from the edge to the middle of the slice.  While the bologna slice browns on one side prepare the bread by spreading mayonnaise on one or both slices of the bread.  After the bologna is browned on the first side flip it over with a fork or spatula and let the other side brown. Remember this side will cook faster. When it is finished pick it up with the fork or spatula and lay it on one side of the bread.  Lay the other side on top of the bologna and enjoy.  Finished.
